What are the treatments for progressive supranuclear palsy ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of progressive supranuclear palsy:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: MAPT-Related Disorders  - Genetic Testing Registry: Progressive supranuclear ophthalmoplegia  - NHS Choices (UK): Diagnosis of Progressive Supranuclear Palsy  - NHS Choices (UK): Treatment of Progressive Supranuclear Palsy  - Partners in Parkinson'
